result.reason: Feature request for colored borders around connection panels to visually distinguish sessions (e.g., prod vs dev) — common request in remote management tools
result.approach: Add a BorderColor property to ConnectionInfo, persist it in XML/SQL serializers, and render a colored border on the active tab or panel when a connection is selected

attempts.raw_output: {"decision":"implement","reason":"Feature request for colored borders around connection panels to visually distinguish sessions (e.g., prod vs dev) — common request in remote management tools","priority":"P3-enhancement","estimated_files":["mRemoteNG/UI/Tabs/ConnectionTab.cs","mRemoteNG/Connection/ConnectionInfo.cs","mRemoteNG/Config/Serializers/ConnectionSerializers/Xml/XmlConnectionSerializer.cs","mRemoteNG/Config/Serializers/ConnectionSerializers/Xml/XmlConnectionDeserializer.cs"],"approach":"Add a BorderColor property to ConnectionInfo, persist it in XML/SQL serializers, and render a colored border on the active tab or panel when a connection is selected"}
